short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change gmail labels color to any you want!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The plugin allows you to freely edit the background color and text in the label of Gmail emails. In the future, it is planned to add the option to also add the option to set the gradient. The settings and changes on the website will take place and refresh themselves.
